macros.macro: if not @findobject 'Ore1';promptalias 'Ore1';endif;if not @findobject 'Ore2';promptalias 'Ore2';endif;if not @findobject 'Home';promptalias 'Home';endif;if not listexists 'TreeBook';createlist 'TreeBook';pushlist 'TreeBook' 'Ore1';pushlist 'TreeBook' 'Ore2';endif;if not listexists 'Runes';createlist 'Runes';pushlist 'Runes' 50;pushlist 'Runes' 51;pushlist 'Runes' 52;pushlist 'Runes' 53;pushlist 'Runes' 54;pushlist 'Runes' 55;pushlist 'Runes' 56;pushlist 'Runes' 57;pushlist 'Runes' 58;pushlist 'Runes' 59;pushlist 'Runes' 60;pushlist 'Runes' 61;pushlist 'Runes' 62;pushlist 'Runes' 63;pushlist 'Runes' 64;pushlist 'Runes' 65;endif;for 0 to 'TreeBook';for 0 to 'Runes';pause 500;clearjournal;pause 500;useobject TreeBook[];waitforgump 0x59 5000;replygump 0x59 Runes[];//tells you which rune you are on, see runelist above;sysmsg 'Rune' 33;sysmsg Runes[] 33;pause 3000;//equips axe if it's not SC;dress 'axe';pause 2000;while organizing;pause 5000;endwhile;//if not @findobject 'lefthand';//change type to your axe;// if findtype 0xf43 0 'backpack';// setalias 'axe' 'found';// equipitem 0x410a9d80 2;// endif;//endif;// if @injournal 'LeftHand';// dress 'axe';// endif;while not @injournal 'enough wood here';pause 300;//chop logs to boards;// if @findtype 0x1bdd 'any' 'backpack';// useobject 'LeftHand';// waitfortarget 1000;// target! 'found';// else;// //chop trees;// useobject 'LeftHand';// waitfortarget 1000;// targettileoffset 0 -1 0;// endif;// while @findtype 0x1bdd 'any' 'backpack';// useobject 'LeftHand';// waitfortarget 1000;// target! 'found';// pause 500;// endwhile;useobject 0x40044dd2;waitfortarget 15000;targettileoffset 0 -1 0;if @injournal "You can't mine" "system" "target";headmsg 'wrong spot';poplist 'Runes' 'front';break;endif;// Change this if your getting overweight, Subtract 25 from your max weight.;if weight > 230;//make remaining logs boards;// while @findtype 0x1bdd 'any' 'backpack';// useobject 'LeftHand';// waitfortarget 1000;// target! 'found';// pause 500;// endwhile;//recall home;useobject 0x40044de9;waitforgump 0x59 15000;replygump 0x59 50;pause 3000;//unload;useobject 0x40044e56;pause 500;organizer 'IngotShift';while organizing;pause 2000;endwhile;pause 2000;//시약 보급;// useobject 0x4001dec1;// pause 1000;// organizer 'RecallRegent';//go back to where you were;pause 4000e;useobject TreeBook[];waitforgump 0x59 5000;replygump 0x59 Runes[];pause 3000;//re-equip axe if needed;// if not @findobject 'lefthand';// equipitem 0x410a9d80 2;// dress 'axe';// pause 1000;// endif;endif;// if @injournal 'use an axe';// break;// endif;//마나 재생;if mana < 20;useskill 'meditation';while mana < maxmana;endwhile;endif;endwhile;endfor;endfor;

if not @findobject 'TreeBookOne';promptalias 'TreeBookOne';endif;if not @findobject 'TreeBookTwo';promptalias 'TreeBookTwo';endif;if not @findobject 'HomeLumber';promptalias 'HomeLumber';endif;if not listexists 'TreeBook';createlist 'TreeBook';pushlist 'TreeBook' 'TreeBookOne';pushlist 'TreeBook' 'TreeBookTwo';endif;if not listexists 'Runes';createlist 'Runes';pushlist 'Runes' 50;pushlist 'Runes' 51;pushlist 'Runes' 52;pushlist 'Runes' 53;pushlist 'Runes' 54;pushlist 'Runes' 55;pushlist 'Runes' 56;pushlist 'Runes' 57;pushlist 'Runes' 58;pushlist 'Runes' 59;pushlist 'Runes' 60;pushlist 'Runes' 61;pushlist 'Runes' 62;pushlist 'Runes' 63;pushlist 'Runes' 64;pushlist 'Runes' 65;endif;for 0 to 'TreeBook';for 0 to 'Runes';pause 500;clearjournal;pause 500;useobject TreeBook[];waitforgump 0x59 5000;replygump 0x59 Runes[];//tells you which rune you are on, see runelist above;sysmsg 'Rune' 33;sysmsg Runes[] 33;pause 3000;//equips axe if it's not SC;// dress 'axe';pause 2000;while organizing;pause 5000;endwhile;//-------------------------------------------------------------------;// 'you can`t mine there.;while not @injournal 'There is no metal here to mine' 'system';pause 300;if @findtype '0xf39' 'any' 'backpack' 'any' '2';@usetype '0xf39' '0' 'backpack' '1' 1;elseif @findtype '0xe86' 'any' 'backpack' 'any' '2';@usetype '0xe86' 'any' 'backpack' 'any' '2';endif;waitfortarget 5000;if direction == 0;targettileoffset 0 -1 0;elseif direction == 1;targettileoffset 1 -1 0;elseif direction == 2;targettileoffset 1 0 0;elseif direction == 3;targettileoffset 1 1 0;elseif direction == 4;targettileoffset 0 1 0;elseif direction == 5;targettileoffset -1 1 0;elseif direction == 6;targettileoffset -1 0 0;elseif direction == 7;targettileoffset -1 -1 0;else;headmsg 'No Tools Found!';endif;pause 600;if @injournal 'no metal' 'system';headmsg 'Time to Move';pause 2000;@clearjournal;endif;while weight >= 380;headmsg 'Time to Smelt';pause 1000;endwhile;while @findtype '0x19b9' 'any' 'backpack' 'any' '2' and weight >= 300;@moveitem 'found' 'mount';pause 600;//recall home;useobject 0x40044de9;waitforgump 0x59 15000;replygump 0x59 50;pause 3000;organizer 'OreShift';endwhile;endwhile;//-------------------------------------------------------------------------;// Change this if your getting overweight, Subtract 25 from your max weight.;if weight > 280;//make remaining logs boards;//recall home;useobject 0x40044de9;waitforgump 0x59 15000;replygump 0x59 50;pause 3000;//unload;organizer 'Boards';while organizing;pause 2000;endwhile;pause 2000;//시약 보급;useobject 0x4001dec1 //시약셋 상자 열기;pause 1000;organizer 'RecallRegent';//go back to where you were;pause 4000;useobject TreeBook[];waitforgump 0x59 5000;replygump 0x59 Runes[];pause 3000;//re-equip axe if needed;endif;if @injournal 'use an axe';break;endif;//마나 재생;if mana < 20;useskill 'meditation';while mana < maxmana;endwhile;endif;endfor;endfor;

if not @findobject 'Ore1';promptalias 'Ore1';endif;if not @findobject 'Ore2';promptalias 'Ore2';endif;if not @findobject 'HomeLumber';promptalias 'HomeLumber';endif;if not listexists 'OreBook';createlist 'OreBook';pushlist 'OreBook' 'Ore1';pushlist 'OreBook' 'Ore2';endif;if not listexists 'Runes';createlist 'Runes';pushlist 'Runes' 50;pushlist 'Runes' 51;pushlist 'Runes' 52;pushlist 'Runes' 53;pushlist 'Runes' 54;pushlist 'Runes' 55;pushlist 'Runes' 56;pushlist 'Runes' 57;pushlist 'Runes' 58;pushlist 'Runes' 59;pushlist 'Runes' 60;pushlist 'Runes' 61;pushlist 'Runes' 62;pushlist 'Runes' 63;pushlist 'Runes' 64;pushlist 'Runes' 65;endif;for 0 to 'OreBook';for 0 to 'Runes';pause 500;clearjournal;msg '다음땅파기';pause 500;useobject OreBook[];waitforgump 0x59 5000;replygump 0x59 Runes[];//tells you which rune you are on, see runelist above;sysmsg 'Rune' 33;sysmsg Runes[] 33;pause 3000;for 0 to OreBook;for 0 to 'Runes';pause 500;while mana < 20;endwhile;@clearjournal;pause 500;useobject OreBook[];waitforgump 0x554b87f3 5000;replygump 0x554b87f3 Runes[];pause 4000;if injournal 'blocked' 'system';@clearjournal;replay;endif;msg '땅파기시작';while not @injournal 'There is no metal here to mine' 'system';//use Pick to northern tile until specified weight is reached;pause 300;usetype '0xe86' '0' 'backpack' 'any' '2';waitfortarget 1000;targettileoffset 0 -1 0;pause 800;if @injournal "You can't mine there." "system";headmsg 'Bad Rune';@clearjournal;poplist 'Runes' 'front';break;endif;// once weight is reached go home, if getting overweight, lower it;if weight > '280';msg '집으로';pause 500;useobject 0x40044de9;waitforgump 0x59 15000;replygump 0x59 50;pause 4000;//put up Ore;// while @findtype '0x19b9' 'any' 'backpack' 'any' '2';//moveitem 'found' 'Ore Storage';pause 800;//endwhile;msg '2';organizer 'IngotShift';while mana < 40;endwhile;//recall back to where you were;if mana < 25;headmsg 'Need mana';useskill 'meditation';while mana < 40;endwhile;endif;msg '물건내리고 다음룬으로';useobject OreBook[];waitforgump 0x554b87f3 5000;replygump 0x554b87f3 Runes[];pause 2000;msg '1';endif;if not @findtype '0xe86' '0' 'backpack' 'any' '2';headmsg 'Out of picks';replay;endif;endwhile;if mana < 25;headmsg 'Need mana';useskill 'meditation';while mana < 40;endwhile;endif;endfor;poplist 'Runes' 'front';endfor;//recall home so Ore container is found;pause 1000;if mana < 25;headmsg 'Need mana';useskill 'meditation';while mana < 40;endwhile;endif;cast 'recall';autotargetobject 'HomeOre';pause 4000;poplist 'OreBook' 'front';

while not @injournal 'There is no metal here to mine' 'system';if @findtype '0xf39' 'any' 'backpack' 'any' '2';@usetype '0xf39' '0' 'backpack' '1' 1;elseif @findtype '0xe86' 'any' 'backpack' 'any' '2';@usetype '0xe86' 'any' 'backpack' 'any' '2';endif;waitfortarget 5000;if direction == 0;targettileoffset 0 -1 0;elseif direction == 1;targettileoffset 1 -1 0;elseif direction == 2;targettileoffset 1 0 0;elseif direction == 3;targettileoffset 1 1 0;elseif direction == 4;targettileoffset 0 1 0;elseif direction == 5;targettileoffset -1 1 0;elseif direction == 6;targettileoffset -1 0 0;elseif direction == 7;targettileoffset -1 -1 0;else;headmsg 'No Tools Found!';endif;pause 600;if @injournal 'no metal' 'system';headmsg 'Time to Move';pause 2000;@clearjournal;endif;while weight >= 380;headmsg 'Time to Smelt';pause 1000;endwhile;while @findtype '0x19b9' 'any' 'backpack' 'any' '2' and weight >= 300;@moveitem 'found' 'mount';pause 600;endwhile;endwhile;msg 2;

if not @findobject 'Ore1';promptalias 'Ore1';endif;if not @findobject 'Ore2';promptalias 'Ore2';endif;if not listexists 'OreBook';createlist 'OreBook';endif;if list 'OreBook' == 0;pushlist 'OreBook' 'Ore1';pushlist 'OreBook' 'Ore2';endif;msg 2;if list 'Runes' == 0;pushlist 'Runes' 50;pushlist 'Runes' 51;pushlist 'Runes' 52;pushlist 'Runes' 53;pushlist 'Runes' 54;pushlist 'Runes' 55;pushlist 'Runes' 56;pushlist 'Runes' 57;pushlist 'Runes' 58;pushlist 'Runes' 59;pushlist 'Runes' 60;pushlist 'Runes' 61;pushlist 'Runes' 62;pushlist 'Runes' 63;pushlist 'Runes' 64;pushlist 'Runes' 65;endif;msg 3;for 0 to OreBook;for 0 to 'Runes';pause 500;while not @injournal 'There is no metal here to mine' 'system';if @findtype '0xf39' 'any' 'backpack' 'any' '2';@usetype '0xf39' '0' 'backpack' '1' 1;elseif @findtype '0xe86' 'any' 'backpack' 'any' '2';@usetype '0xe86' 'any' 'backpack' 'any' '2';endif;msg 5;waitfortarget 5000;if direction == 0;targettileoffset 0 -1 0;elseif direction == 1;targettileoffset 1 -1 0;elseif direction == 2;targettileoffset 1 0 0;elseif direction == 3;targettileoffset 1 1 0;elseif direction == 4;targettileoffset 0 1 0;elseif direction == 5;targettileoffset -1 1 0;elseif direction == 6;targettileoffset -1 0 0;elseif direction == 7;targettileoffset -1 -1 0;else;headmsg 'No Tools Found!';endif;pause 600;if @injournal 'no metal' 'system';headmsg 'Time to Move';pause 2000;@clearjournal;endif;while weight >= 380;headmsg 'Time to Smelt';pause 1000;endwhile;while @findtype '0x19b9' 'any' 'backpack' 'any' '2' and weight >= 300;@moveitem 'found' 'mount';pause 600;endwhile;endwhile;endfor;endfor;// 리콜;

//Author: Experience;//Title: Recalling Miner;//Description: Recalling Miner. Must have a 1 Pickaxe or ingots.;//You will need a book with the default rune marked right next to your storage.;//Stand South of each Spot you want to mine;//All Books must have 16 runes to run properly!!;//Be sure to stock Regs before playing!;removelist 'Runes';removelist 'OreBook';@clearjournal;headmsg "Reminder: Have your regs stocked...";pause 200;headmsg 'About 100 of each recall reg...';if not @findalias 'Ore Storage';promptalias 'Ore Storage';endif;if not @findobject 'Ore1';promptalias 'Ore1';endif;if not @findobject 'Ore2';promptalias 'Ore2';endif;//if not @findobject 'Ore3';// promptalias 'Ore3';//endif;if not @findobject 'HomeOre';promptalias 'HomeOre';endif;if not listexists 'OreBook';createlist 'OreBook';endif;if list 'OreBook' == 0;pushlist 'OreBook' 'Ore1';pushlist 'OreBook' 'Ore2';// pushlist 'OreBook' 'Ore3';endif;if @findtype '0xe86' '0' 'backpack' 'any' '2';headmsg 'Pick found. Ready!';elseif @findtype '0x1bf2' '0' 'backpack' 'any' '2' and skill 'tinkering' > 80;headmsg 'resorting to Tinkering....';@usetype '0x1eb8' '0' 'backpack' 'any' '2';waitforgump 0x38920abd 15000;replygump 0x38920abd 8;waitforgump 0x38920abd 15000;replygump 0x38920abd 114;waitforgump 0x38920abd 15000;replygump 0x38920abd 114;else;headmsg 'No way to mine found...';stop;endif;if not listexists 'Runes';createlist 'Runes';endif;if list 'Runes' == 0;pushlist 'Runes' 50;pushlist 'Runes' 51;pushlist 'Runes' 52;pushlist 'Runes' 53;pushlist 'Runes' 54;pushlist 'Runes' 55;pushlist 'Runes' 56;pushlist 'Runes' 57;pushlist 'Runes' 58;pushlist 'Runes' 59;pushlist 'Runes' 60;pushlist 'Runes' 61;pushlist 'Runes' 62;pushlist 'Runes' 63;pushlist 'Runes' 64;pushlist 'Runes' 65;endif;for 0 to OreBook;for 0 to 'Runes';pause 500;while mana < 20;endwhile;@clearjournal;pause 500;//useobject 0x40044e15;//waitforgump 0x59 15000;//replygump 0x59 50;useobject OreBook[];waitforgump 0x59 15000;replygump 0x59 Runes[];pause 4000;if injournal 'fail' 'system';@clearjournal;replay;endif;if injournal 'blocked' 'system';@clearjournal;replay;endif;while not @injournal 'There is no metal here to mine' 'system';//use Pick to northern tile until specified weight is reached;pause 300;usetype '0xe86' '0' 'backpack' 'any' '2';waitfortarget 1000;targettileoffset 0 -1 0;pause 800;if @injournal "You can't mine there." "system";headmsg 'Bad Rune';@clearjournal;poplist 'Runes' 'front';break;endif;// once weight is reached go home, if getting overweight, lower it;if weight > '325';cast "Recall";waitfortarget 15000;target! 0x40051122;pause 4000;msg '첫번쨰';if @injournal 'The spell fizzles.' 'Fizzles.';cast "Recall";waitfortarget 15000;target! 0x40051122;pause 4000;msg'리콜실패후 재리콜';replay;endif;if @injournal 'destination not found.' 'destination';cast "Recall";waitfortarget 15000;target! 0x40051122;pause 4000;msg'리콜실패후 재리콜';endif;if injournal 'fizzles' 'spell';@clearjournal;replay;endif;//put up Ore;organizer 'IngotShift';while @findtype '0x19b9' 'any' 'backpack' 'any' '2';moveitem 'found' 'Ore Storage';pause 800;endwhile;while mana < 40;endwhile;//recall back to where you were;if mana < 25;headmsg 'Need mana';useskill 'meditation';while mana < 40;endwhile;endif;useobject OreBook[];waitforgump 0x554b87f3 5000;replygump 0x554b87f3 Runes[];pause 2000;endif;if not @findtype '0xe86' '0' 'backpack' 'any' '2';headmsg 'Out of picks';replay;endif;endwhile;if mana < 25;headmsg 'Need mana';useskill 'meditation';while mana < 40;endwhile;endif;endfor;poplist 'Runes' 'front';endfor;//recall home so Ore container is found;pause 1000;if mana < 25;headmsg 'Need mana';useskill 'meditation';while mana < 40;endwhile;endif;cast 'recall';autotargetobject 'HomeOre';pause 4000;poplist 'OreBook' 'front';
